shows.title: The Other Side / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Paranormal investigator Chip Coffey will discuss the Other Side, what happens when we get there, and what we can do on Earth to help us on our journey. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give George Noory a call and share experiences, weird tales, or whatever is on your mind!

shows.title: Past Lives & Consciousness / Intuition Signs
shows.first_half: In the first half, author Jacob Cooper joins Lisa Garr (email) to discuss karma, past life regression therapy, and between-lives soul regression. He  supports individuals in navigating their life journeys and addressing their most significant questions, and deepening self-awareness. In the second half, neuroscientist and Oxford University-trained medical doctor Tara Swart will reveal how to listen to your intuition and receive signs from departed loved ones.
shows.second_half: 6-10pm PT - Art Bell - Somewhere in Time returns to 1/3/02 when Prof. Ronald Munson addressed the ethical ramifications of human cloning.

shows.title: AI Potentials / Alien Abductee Revelations
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and Founder/CEO of The Shift Network, Stephen Dinan joins George Noory to address how artificial intelligence (AI) will affect humanity. He'll reveal how AI plays a role in vulnerabilities, economic hardships, and even wars.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author Bill Konkolesky has been the State Director of the Michigan chapter of the Mutual UFO Network (MUFON) since 2004. He'll discuss the accounts of alien abductees who have just begun to publicly share their stories, as well as what he has learned from his 50+ years of being an abductee himself, including the differences between abductee and experiencer.

shows.title: Future of Humans in Space / Ed & Lorraine Warren Cases
shows.first_half: First Half: Brennan Spiegel is a physician, professor of medicine, and research scientist at Cedars-Sinai and UCLA in Los Angeles. He will explore how gravity silently shapes our biology on Earth, and what happens when we leave it behind. Brennan will discuss the future of human physiology in space, drawing from NASA research and his own work with virtual reality.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Tony Spera is a paranormal researcher and the son-in-law of famed investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren. He'll discuss the paranormal, the groundbreaking work of the Warrens, the sale of their home, and the future of the museum they founded (NESPR).

shows.title: Trends & Predictions / UFO Phenomena
shows.first_half: First Half: Founder and director of the Trends Research Institute, Gerald Celente, will talk about what he sees on the horizon for the United States, and the rapidly changing global landscape. He regularly provides business and industry with customized presentations and research studies in over 300 trend categories.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Canadian author, researcher, and historical analyst Grant Cameron will discuss his latest research in the UFO field, as well as the intersection of consciousness and UFO phenomena. He'll also share alien abductee reports and explore the role of vibration and heartbeat tracking.

shows.title: Mastering Anxiety / Akashic Records & Angels
shows.first_half: First Half: Prof. David H. Rosmarin will talk about how anxiety, one of the most common and misunderstood human emotions, can actually be a source of strength. He will share a four-step process to transform anxiety into a tool for growth, and explain how we can partner with it to perform better, and live more fully.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Akashic Records teacher Amy Robeson will reveal how her lifelong connection with angels began, and how its evolved. She'll delve into radiant color frequencies and their link to the crystalline realms, as well as how the Akashic Records reveal past lives, soul contracts, and cosmic lineages.

shows.title: Current Events & Prophecy / Dark Happenings
shows.first_half: First Half: Former military intelligence analyst Benjamin Baruch will discuss the major issues of our time, including intelligence updates regarding the U.S., NATO, and the Axis powers. He'll draw the connection between current scenarios and their connection to biblical prophecy.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and experiencer of dark happenings, Diane Satterfield, will share her personal, paranormal, and otherworldly experiences. She'll talk about how she, her family, and friends were drawn into this world of odd, strange, and sometimes beautiful, sometimes terrifying experiences.

shows.title: Vampires: Past & Present / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Father Sebastiaan, who has been active in the vampire subculture since 1992, joins guest host Richard Syrett. They'll discuss the role that vampires have played in the past, and what they mean in our modern day. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Richard a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
